overview: The story about how Hamid and Jaafar, who worked as farmers and RELA volunteers, together sought the support of the villagers to bring down Jamali, a ruthless and unruly representative of the 'Clean, Efficient and Trusted' people. and promoted Hamid as the new people's representative to replace Jamali. In addition, it tells the current issues of the villagers, urging the people to keep savings in the National Trust, as well as the romance between the Dharma and Rosnah.
title: Aku Yang Berhormat
